title: Can't assign command to Ctrl+Backspace
description: I am unable to assign any command to the keyboard shortcut Ctrl+Backspace. When I try to assign a command to this shortcut, nothing happens. It seems that Ctrl+Backspace is not recognized as a valid keyboard shortcut.
OB: Ctrl+Backspace should delete the previous word by default.
EB: Out of the box, Ctrl+Backspace should delete the previous word.
SR: The software should recognize Ctrl+Backspace as a valid keyboard shortcut and allow users to assign commands to it.
